title: SET_RADIUS_BLIP_EDGE
content:
0x25615540D894B8140x40E25DB8// SetRadiusBlipEdge
void SET_RADIUS_BLIP_EDGE(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);Parameters:blip: The blip handletoggle: Whether to turn off or on the effectEnabling this on a radius blip will make it outline only.\
Please note that this only works on a radius blip (i.e. one generated using ADD_BLIP_FOR_RADIUS), not a normal blip.Example result:\
Examples:Lualocal coords = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local radiusBlip = AddBlipForRadius(coords, 100.0) -- need to have .0
SetBlipColour(radiusBlip, 1)
SetBlipAlpha(radiusBlip, 255)
SetRadiusBlipEdge(radiusBlip, true)
codeBlocks:
// SetRadiusBlipEdge
void SET_RADIUS_BLIP_EDGE(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);

local coords = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local radiusBlip = AddBlipForRadius(coords, 100.0) -- need to have .0
SetBlipColour(radiusBlip, 1)
SetBlipAlpha(radiusBlip, 255)
SetRadiusBlipEdge(radiusBlip, true)
